column5: To T.J. if he decides to start a thread. Yes this IS a threat
Go ahead TJ.   I double-dog dare ya to apologize to us Americans (Before the game).  Surely there is no such thing as deja vu ?
Being Scottish and not really caring who wins, I sense some fear from TJ on this one........  :lol:
So is a kick in the nads....

Nice ! Guess thats why we always wear a jock  Personally, I'd like to extend a warm thank you to ALL our American fans (I mean friends) for investing in the talent to put a worthy opponent on the ice.
very well said and i concur
